      • Constant Field Values

    • AUTO_CORRECT_TO_AMOUNT

      public static boolean AUTO_CORRECT_TO_AMOUNT
      It will adjust the currency exchange rate or quotation for the cash account amount. Sometimes the user tries to get the total amount as exact as possible by adjusting the rate or exchange rate. In this case, the user interface rounds the calculated amount, thus only the rounded calculation results in the desired calculated amount. The backend can adjust the two parameters even more exactly with a rounding of FID_MAX_FRACTION_DIGITS.

    • SHORT_STANDARD_DATE_FORMAT

    • YOUNGEST_TRADING_CALENDAR_DAY

      public static final String YOUNGEST_TRADING_CALENDAR_DAY

    • MAX_DAY_DIFF_CURRENCY_UNTIL_NOW

      public static final int MAX_DAY_DIFF_CURRENCY_UNTIL_NOW
      Sometimes the EOD of the currency pair is not yet updated, in this case the existing current price can be taken if there are not more than so many days between the requested date and the current one.

      public static final int DIVIDEND_CHECK_PAY_DATE_TOLERANCE_IN_DAYS

    • FORK_JOIN_POOL_CORE_MULTIPLIER

      public static final int FORK_JOIN_POOL_CORE_MULTIPLIER

    • MAX_DAYS_FOR_SECURITY_IS_REFLECTING_SPLIT

      public static final double MAX_DAYS_FOR_SECURITY_IS_REFLECTING_SPLIT
      It is possible that the split from the calendar was internally assigned to a wrong security, therefore after reaching this number of days the repetitive query to the connector is terminated.
